rationales.kitchen_operator: Operators must keep health permits and inspections current to stay open in San Francisco's shared kitchen program.
rationales.marketplace_operator: Marketplace operators coordinate remote ordering and must maintain clear health disclosures for end diners.
rationales.platform_team: Platform engineering keeps the compliance status feed accurate for partner dashboards.
rationales.change_candidates: City hall is exploring adjustments to lighten recurring fees for low-risk operators.

requirements.title: Maintain food facility permit
requirements.authority: San Francisco Department of Public Health
requirements.rationale: Annual permit demonstrates the facility meets baseline sanitation controls.

requirements.title: Expose health disclosure in marketplace flows
requirements.rationale: Marketplace flows must surface the latest inspection score when selling prepared meals.

requirements.title: Track inspection calendar with reminders
requirements.rationale: Automated reminders prevent lapses and reduce manual follow-up from customer success.

change_candidates.title: Expand low-risk menu fee relief
change_candidates.rationale: Lobbying for reduced renewals could lower annual cash burn for ghost kitchens by ~18%.

rationales.kitchen_operator: Operators coordinate with Alameda County for joint inspections and must keep documentation handy.
rationales.marketplace_operator: Marketplace teams message customers about staggered activation timelines during fire inspections.
rationales.platform_team: Platform tooling syncs Oakland's fee schedule into Prep dashboards for finance review.
rationales.change_candidates: Oakland is piloting multi-year permits for consistently compliant operators.

requirements.title: Secure Alameda County health permit
requirements.rationale: Primary permit required before the shared kitchen can host marketplace partners.

requirements.title: Complete annual fire inspection walkthrough
requirements.rationale: Fire marshal walkthrough validates suppression systems before new tenants cook.

requirements.title: Sync permit roster to marketplace
requirements.rationale: Data sync ensures only cleared vendors list menu items in Oakland.

change_candidates.title: Join multi-year permit pilot
change_candidates.rationale: Joining the pilot would reduce renewal touch points for proven safe operators.

rationales.kitchen_operator: Berkeley's health division focuses on hazard analysis plans for commissaries.
rationales.marketplace_operator: Marketplace support must confirm allergen statements before menus go live.
rationales.platform_team: Engineering supplies compliance exports used during Berkeley's quarterly readiness sync.
rationales.change_candidates: City council is evaluating digital submission pilots to shrink turnaround time.

requirements.title: Submit HACCP plan for review
requirements.rationale: Hazard analysis plan documents controls for shared cold storage management.

requirements.title: Verify allergen disclosures for menu items
requirements.rationale: Accurate allergen flags reduce enforcement escalations and protect diners.

requirements.title: Deliver quarterly readiness export
requirements.rationale: Exports summarize open items used by operations and legal to track readiness.

change_candidates.title: Pilot digital submission workflow
change_candidates.rationale: Co-designing the pilot could shave weeks off approval timelines for new hosts.
